posts.post_title: For Sale: N172 Old Judges Ned Williamson & Jim Ryan SGC
posts.post_content:
I have the following N172s for sale. Shipping included.

Ned Williamson SGC 20- $425

Jimmy Ryan SGC 10- $365

Both have great images and clean fronts. 

Email with any questions. First to respond by email to [url]jadams3318@yahoo.com[/url], gets the card.

Josh
